page.title: 03EAST HADDON A POETIC VIEW
page.content: The church,big and old, Standing motionless and quiet, Surrounded by a green field Everything is quiet and still Only broken by the monsters that roar along the road Orangey brown buildings tower above me Many times bigger The one small shop shuts Evening draws on, The illuminated building opens, The humans call it the pub, Early morning comes bringing light Children go to school The village all on its own Surrounded by fields and farms In the midlands, The village East Haddon ME? I am a mouse. Andrew Ward Age 10.
